overview: Mary Sharp is currently Partner at Griffith, Sadler & Sharp, P.A., as well as President of the National Conference of Women’s Bar Associations, and is a past Liaison to the ABAâ€™s Commission on Women in the Profession. She is a member of numerous bar associations and professional organizations. She served on the Board of South Carolina Women Lawyers Association from 1997 to 2005, and in 2003, served as its President.
